events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate and confirmed their documents are complete.
The application has been categorized under Engineering for the Software Engineer role based on the candidate's resume and experience.
A recruiter from the engineering recruitment team has been assigned to manage the screening and interview process for this candidate.
Initial phone screening completed successfully, and the candidate demonstrated good knowledge of software development principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback, expressing strong interest in proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-07 at 10:00 AM with two senior engineers to assess coding skills and system design capabilities.
